text: læa swn hnung cak sayyan thanghlay khxng phraxngkh khux cea ca hen phændin hæng krang tx meux phraxngkh thrng hlang na fn lng ma bn man man k ca mi chiwitchiwa læa hı phuch phl thæcring phu sung hı man mi chiwit khun ma nan k ca thrng hı chiwit kæ khn tay di xyang nænxn thæcring phraxngkh nan pen phuthrng xnuphaph henux thuk sing
